title: vaalai manOnmaNi
sahitya:
vAlai manOnmaNi mAdhavi shankari vAsudEvan arum tangai mahEshvari

 mAyA vilAsiniyE mahAkALi mAvur prakAshiniyE



caraNam 1



anbu niraindu tadumbum un sundara bimbam tanai nATTiDum yOgam

 inbam tarum yAgam mahAkALi anbin perum pAgam 



caraNam 2



vancap-prapancam tanil cancalam koNdu nenjinil anjiDum sancitam tIra

 nIyE aruL taruvAi mahAkALi shEyan edir varuvAi



caraNam 3



kEshavanum uyar vAsavanum malar vAsanum pUshanai sheidiDum shrI hari-

kEshan orukUrE mahAkALi dAsanai kANbArE
